word:
And then there were the two mounts, there were places that they had to go through that repetition, one the mount of curses and the other the mount of blessings. From these two prominent positions the advantages of the blessing and the disadvantages of the curse were pronounced.--Ms 7, 1904. ("Counsel on School Age Entrance," January 14, 1904. Copied from Document File No. 102--School Board Minutes.) 

Released March 11, 1975.
